statements: SELECT medication_name, dosage, frequency FROM medications WHERE prescription_date = '2022-09-05';
SELECT patient_id, prescriber_id, medication_name FROM medications WHERE dosage > 50;
SELECT * FROM medications WHERE patient_id = 100 AND refill_allowed = TRUE;
SELECT prescription_date, frequency FROM medications WHERE medication_id = 10;
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM medications WHERE patient_id = 200 AND prescription_date < '2022-10-01';
SELECT * FROM medications WHERE patient_id = 123 ORDER BY prescription_date DESC
SELECT medication_name, dosage, frequency FROM medications WHERE prescriber_id = 456 AND refill_allowed = TRUE
SELECT medication_name, dosage, prescription_date FROM medications WHERE dosage > 50 AND refill_allowed = TRUE ORDER BY prescription_date ASC
SELECT * FROM medications WHERE patient_id = 789 AND frequency LIKE '%times a day%'
SELECT prescription_date, dosage, frequency FROM medications WHERE medication_name = 'Aspirin'
SELECT * FROM prescriptions WHERE medication_name='Aspirin';
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM prescriptions WHERE patient_id=12;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth>'1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM prescriptions WHERE frequency='twice daily';
SELECT patient_name, phone_number FROM patients WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT * FROM prescriptions WHERE dosage > 50
SELECT patient_name, medication_name FROM patients JOIN prescriptions ON patients.patient_id = prescriptions.patient_id WHERE frequency = 'Daily'
SELECT * FROM prescriptions WHERE medication_name LIKE 'Ibuprofen%' ORDER BY dosage DESC
SELECT patient_name, address, phone_number FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01' ORDER BY patient_name ASC
SELECT * FROM patients LEFT JOIN prescriptions ON patients.patient_id = prescriptions.patient_id
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, gender, address FROM patients;
SELECT medication_name, dosage, issued_date FROM prescriptions WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT error_type, error_description FROM medication_errors WHERE prescription_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM prescriptions WHERE medication_name = 'Paracetamol' ORDER BY dosage ASC;
SELECT prescription_id, medication_name, dosage FROM prescriptions WHERE issued_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY dosage DESC, medication_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT patient_name, gender, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY date_of_birth ASC, patient_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT prescription_id, medication_name, issued_date FROM prescriptions WHERE medication_name LIKE '%aspirin%' ORDER BY issued_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT p.patient_name, e.error_type, e.error_date FROM patients p JOIN medication_errors e ON p.patient_id = e.prescription_id ORDER BY e.error_date ASC, p.patient_name ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT e.error_id, e.error_description, p.patient_name FROM medication_errors e LEFT JOIN patients p ON e.prescription_id = p.patient_id WHERE e.error_description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY e.error_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM prescriptions;
SELECT prescription_id, medication_name FROM prescriptions WHERE frequency = 'daily';
SELECT MAX(age) as max_age, MIN(age) as min_age FROM patients;
SELECT physician_name, specialty FROM physicians ORDER BY physician_name DESC;
SELECT prescription_id, patient_id, date_time FROM medication_log ORDER BY date_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM prescriptions WHERE medication_name = 'Aspirin';
SELECT patient_name, age, address FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT physician_name, specialty, contact_number FROM physicians ORDER BY specialty DESC;
SELECT prescription_id, medication_name, dosage, frequency FROM prescriptions WHERE dosage LIKE '%mg%';
SELECT patient_id, physician_id, date_time FROM medication_log WHERE action = 'Administered' ORDER BY date_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT prescription_id, medication_name, dosage, prescription_date FROM prescriptions WHERE patient_id = 101;
SELECT pharmacy_name, location FROM pharmacies WHERE pharmacy_id = 5;
SELECT doctor_name, specialty FROM doctors ORDER BY doctor_name DESC;
SELECT error_description, error_date FROM medication_errors WHERE prescription_id = 201 ORDER BY error_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM prescriptions WHERE patient_id = 12345;
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM prescriptions WHERE dosage > 50 ORDER BY medication_name ASC;
SELECT doctor_name, specialty FROM doctors WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology' ORDER BY doctor_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, gender, address FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-12-31';
SELECT pharmacy_name, location FROM pharmacies WHERE location LIKE '%New York%' ORDER BY pharmacy_name ASC;
